REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Exempts the Capital District transportation authority (CDTA) from bond issuance charges
Summary: Exempts the Capital District Transportation Authority from bond issuance charges.
LawCode: Amd ยง2976, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to exempting the Capital District transportation authority from bond issuance charges
